title: The Female Philosopher - the word "alone" serves

content.question: In context, the word “alone” (line 5) primarily serves to

choices.label: emphasize the loneliness felt by the speaker
define the limits of the relationship
imply that the future will be happier than the present
suggest that a platonic relationship will foster deeper love

content.answer: define the limits of the relationship

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Distinguish between the literal and figurative meanings of words and phrases.
